Text: Thank you for your orderyou for shopping at DisneyStorecom As a special thank you were offering you off your next purchase Your Discount Coupon Code is WETHANKYOU Heres how to redeem your discount coupon Before you begin shopping be sure to log in as a registered user Not registered Go to DSRegistrationprocessRestartFlowt Its free Once youve placed items in your Shopping Cart follow these three simple steps to redeem your coupon COPY and PASTE the coupon code into the text box on the left of your screen then click the Add button This will add the coupon to the Promotion area of your shopping cart SELECT the promotion item by clicking on the appropriate button in the Select column CLICK the Apply to Order button Once the promotion has been applied to your shopping cart you may either go Back to Shopping or Begin Checkout Start shopping now and enjoy your savings at Please remember you must SELECT and then APPLY this coupon to your order to redeem your savings A summary of your order appears below If you have any questions please contact Guest Services at or call To help us provide you the best service please include your order number and billing address on all correspondence To track your order please go to Order Tracking at TemplatesGeneralCSSDSMemberstem or click the Order Tracking button on our Homepage Your current DisneyStorecom purchase reads as follows Order Number Email Address Ship To Alyssa Peek Oak Harbour Dr North Palm Beach FL US Shipping Method US Domestic Express Shipping Alyssa Peek Oak Harbour Dr North Palm Beach FL US Shipping Method US Domestic Express Shipping Quantity Item Price Item Description Cinderella Magic Mirror Cinderella Princess Best Friend Doll Subtotal Discount Gift Wrap Shipping Handling Sales Tax Grand Total Amount This confirmation reflects receipt of your purchase only If items are unavailable or on back order we will notify you by email Instock items with standard shipping should arrive within days Instock items with express shipping should arrive in days Delivery times will be longer for international destinations If any of your order information listed above appears incorrect please contact us immediately Again thanks for shopping at DisneyStorecom and we look forward to the opportunity to serve you again in the near future Remember to take advantage of your special offers for preferred guests at thankyou Plus dont forget to visit today and make Disneycom your familys home on the Internet For KIDS its nonstop fun exploration and learning For GROWNUPS its entertainment and information along with the confidence that the entire family has a trusted place online to play DisneyStorecom Guest Services
